hadiths.text: Narrator not mentioned:And the Prophet said: "If the people knew what (reward) is in the call (Adhan) and the first row, and they found no other way to get that except drawing lots, then they would draw lots

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الصَّفِّ الأَوَّلِ
chapter.eng-name: : What Has Been Related About The Virtue Of The First Row
